title: Find the mean.
text: First, you want to find the mean. This is done by adding all the values together and dividing by the number of entires.

title: Find the mean.
text: What is the mean of this data?

title: Find the median.
text: Secondly you want to find the median. This is done by ordering the values and finding the midpoint.

title: Find the median.
text: What is the median of this data?

title: Understanding skewness in relation to mean and median.
text: Lastly, seeing that the median and mean are close, and that the mode lies close to the middle of the data, it means the data is symmetrical.
